title: Cognitive Process Integration Design for Multidimensional Science Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theories in Science and Managerial-Level Work Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening complex thinking skills applicable to science-based decision-making scenarios in corporate settings

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex problems by integrating diverse scientific domains and real-world work contexts.
Learners can derive practical solutions by progressively applying scientific theories according to the simple-to-complex methodology.
Learners can perform efficient decision-making by employing cognitive strategies that emphasize key elements under multiple conditions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
